One of the first steps in obtaining a communication device, commonly referred to as a speech-generating device (SGD), is to call your insurance company to verify that your insurance policy includes coverage for speech-generating device. The policyholder or authorized family member is the best individual to make this call. If an SGD is not a covered benefit under your specific plan, it is helpful to know that before you start the funding process. Make sure to contact your local consultant if you find that your plan does not include coverage; they are happy to guide you with alternative options.
